title: 95/370/EC: Commission Decision of 7 September 1995 amending Decision 94/1077/EC on the clearance of the accounts presented by Greece, Spain and Italy in respect of the expenditure for 1990 of the EAGGF, Guarantee Section (Only the Greek, Spanish and Italian texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 7 September 1995 amending Decision 94/1077/EC on the clearance of the  accounts presented by Greece, Spain and Italy in respect of the expenditure for 1990 of the EAGGF,  Guarantee Section (Only the Greek, Spanish and Italian texts are authentic) (95/370/EC)
